description:
A state-of-the-art mountaineering axe that bridges the gap between traditional mountain ice axes and technical steep ice tools. The gently curved shaft offers clearance over bulges and good leverage when you’re really pulling hard.

  • Lightweight, shaped aluminum shaft
  • Pick is one piece with an aggressive tip
  • Flush mounted durable spike aids plunging
name: Grivel Air Tech Evolution T Ice Axe
